meanings.definition: The quality or state of being illusory.
meanings.sent1: The illusorinesses of the magician's tricks amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The illusorinesses of the mirage in the desert fooled the weary travelers.
meanings.sent3: The illusorinesses of the fake spider toy scared the little girl.
meanings.sent4: The illusorinesses of the dream world enveloped her in a surreal haze.
meanings.sent5: The illusorinesses of the virtual reality game made it hard to distinguish from reality.

meanings.definition: The deceptive appearance or impression of something.
meanings.sent1: The illusorinesses of the mask hid his true identity.
meanings.sent2: The illusorinesses of the painting made it seem like a window to another world.
meanings.sent3: The illusorinesses of the fake mustache made him look like a different person.
meanings.sent4: The illusorinesses of the fog obscured the path ahead.
meanings.sent5: The illusorinesses of the hologram made it seem like the singer was really there.
